__TOC__

The purpose of this page is, to make it easier to find people (in the GNOME world) to talk to, once you tracked a problem.

When you don't know who you should talk to, you can go in #gnome-hackers (irc.gnome.org) and ask your question there. You'll probably be redirected to the right channel/person.

Please do not list persons in this table since we don't want to add too much pressure on people.
